name: Form.io
description: Form.io is a combined Form and Data Management platform for form-based Serverless web applications.
need: We use the platform to build complex forms with language, offline and other userfull capabilities.
comment: We use form.io portal to build form and create JSON representation of the form from which the form is created in our APP. A path to json form is defined in src/defs/app.json.js as appObj['formdefinition'].

file.name: formio.full.min
file.description: Styles applied to form.io components excluding bootstrap/bootswatch styles

file.name: formio.full.min
file.description: JavaScript for rendering and dealing with form.io forms
